name: Poison Gas
description: You create a fog of poisonous gas in a 15 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Creatures that begin their turn in the area take 1d4 + MOVE poison damage and must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned. The gas cloud dissipates at the beginning of your next turn.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
